content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate and Steel Plate Production Structure at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position(5.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position(10.0, 0.0)
- Stone furnace at position(15.0, 0.0)

###Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of Burner Mining Drill at position(16.0, 71.0)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
  - Ensure the target position is clear before attempting to place an entity.
* Errors when crafting items with missing raw resources
  - Gather required raw resources before attempting to craft items.
* Errors when extracting items from furnaces
  - Ensure the furnace contains the desired item and has finished processing before extracting.
* Errors when setting recipes for entities
  - Ensure the entity exists and is capable of having its recipe set before attempting to do so.
* Errors when using undefined variables
  - Ensure all variables are defined before using them in the code.
* Errors when extracting items that are not available in the furnace
  - Check the furnace status and contents before attempting to extract items.
* Errors when furnaces are out of ingredients
  - Ensure furnaces are supplied with necessary ingredients before attempting to smelt items.
* Errors when furnaces are out of fuel
  - Ensure furnaces are supplied with necessary fuel before attempting to smelt items.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
